about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.
Lily got herself a new yoga instructor to train her and help relieve her back pain, but James has other things in mind.
Will she make her husband happy and sleep with her instructor?
Follow the story to find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Join Lily and James on their quest to spice up their marriage.

EPISODE 3

The long hours at the office, combined with her recent extracurricular activities with her boss, have put a lot of pressure on Lily's back, and she finds herself in need of exercise. And what better way to relieve back pain than yoga, right?
Following a friend's advice, she books a late class with the gym's yoga instructor, looking forward to taking care of her body.
However, James has other things in mind, and he's not above playing dirty to get what he wants. He seduces his wife and sends her to her training hot and bothered, knowing she can't resist her instructor's charms if she's turned on.

Will Lily relent and make her husband happy?
Will her instructor welcome her advances?

Follow the story to find out.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
